basicInfo.name: Jin
basicInfo.flavor: Jin's iron fists are the result of extremely rigorous training. He is capable of smashing just about anything with a single punch.

Normal Attack.desc:
Single Enemy
 - Deals damage equal to 100% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 120% of Physical Attack.

Skill 1.name: Explosive Fist
Skill 1.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 120% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 775 1 time(s).
 - Deals Fixed damage equal to 1100 1 time(s).
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 145% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Damage: To 1100 Fixed damage.

Skill 2.name: Extreme Fist
Skill 2.desc:
3 Enemies
 - Deals damage equal to 145% of Physical Attack 1 time(s).
 - 55% chance to inflict Stun. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Increases Damage: To 175% of Physical Attack.
 - Increases Chance: Stun chance becomes 65%.

Passive.name: Extreme Training
Passive.desc:
All Allies
 - Grants Silence Immunity. [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Grants Silence Immunity upon using a basic attack 1 time(s). [Duration: 2 Turn(s)]
 - Self
 - Grants Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Skill Enhancement Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 27% Crit Rate Boost. [Always Active]
Transcend Lv.2 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: Barrier equal to 160% of Physical Attack when HP falls to 50% or lower. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)] [Once per Battle]
Transcend Lv.6 Effect
 - Self
 - Adds Effect: 31% Physical Attack Boost. [Duration: 3 Turn(s)]

transcendence.transcend_7: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_8: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_9: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_10: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_11: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.
transcendence.transcend_12: Increases All Attack, Defense, and HP by 2%.

profile.likes: Lina, training, Li, passion, hard work, competitions, persistence, eggs
profile.dislikes: Complicated roads, giving up, laziness, sweet things
profile.story: Jin's iron fists are the result of extremely rigorous training. He is capable of smashing just about anything with a single punch.

basicInfo.name: Jin
basicInfo.flavor: As Jin left Auric Nation, he met Li and battled against the monk. Jin suffered a severe loss, and so returned to his hometown to train.

basicInfo.name: Jin
basicInfo.flavor: Jin wanders the world searching for strong opponents to prove his power. He traveled to the Auric Nation to battle its famous priests, but found the country in ruins.
